name: Santa Girls
description:
You and your best friend have been happy for a long time, but now she wants to start her own band AND compete in a Battle of the Bands competition. Not only that but she insists that you have to front the band and help her get those she deems worthy on board to help.

Features

  • A cute and fun, well written storyline.
  • Multiple routes and choices that affect the endings.
  • High quality characters, backgrounds and CG Scenes.
  • 1080p window & full screen options.
  • Multiple save slots and full VN functions.

* A Visual Novel Game focusing on yuri/lesbian romances.
